Bait Packing System

Developed to support a commercial bait wholesaler’s bait packing needs. System automatically adds dirt, water, lid, and label to multiple bait containers. Dirt can be loaded into a bulk hopper with a skid loader or by hand. Dirt fill system automatically measures dirt volume to a user-adjustable level. System can support multiple container/lid sizes and configurations.

Mitech Systems, Ltd.

Mechanical Engineering/Machine Design
